message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product for a special price of $15000. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a truly unique item, and I think you'll love it. What do you think?

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but I believe $10000 would be a fair price for me to acquire it. Please let me know if this is something we can agree upon.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer of $10000. I appreciate your interest in the product, but I'm afraid it's a bit lower than I was hoping for. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $13000. Would you be willing to consider this price?

Hello Alice, I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value I place on the product, I would like to propose an offer of $12000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations and brings us closer to reaching an agreement.
